Name: Caf√© de Fluiter
Review Text: It is definitely the most welcoming place in town. I wish I could come back soon. The bartender is such a sweet piece. Just in love.

Name: Caf√© de Fluiter
Review Text: Local Cafe bar, it has all you need. Cheap beer and a very polite owner, serving you with a smile

Name: Caf√© de Fluiter
Review Text: Spent a pleasant 10 minutes here yesterday afternoon while waiting for a house viewing. Billiards table covered in leather. Warmly furnished in woods and reds. A friendly barman. Reminded me of certain Dublin pubs in feeling like a good place to hide out and put the world on pause for the duration of a drink or two.

Name: Caf√© de Fluiter
Review Text: Super friendly and cozy atmosphere! The bartender Brum was a joy to chat with and although a pub for locals I felt totally welcome. I wish it was on my corner at home :)

Name: Caf√© de Fluiter
Review Text: Very friendly service, good draft beer, a pool table for who wants to play and a cat as mascot :-) cosy and frequented by locals, a nice place to enjoy a cold one!

Name: Caf√© de Fluiter
Review Text: Friendly bartender. Type of bar that seems to have regular locals come too

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Recently moved here around the corner and you couldn't wish for better neighbors than cafe de Fluiter! Sweet owner, good service and a nice place to get a drink and bitterbal! Always pleasant. ‚Ä¶
